welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huaquillas, Ecuador! Known for its vibrant culture, delicious food, and beautiful landscapes, we are excited to have you here and invite you to immerse yourself in our charming city. Enjoy your stay and make wonderful memories.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Tumbes Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Tumbes Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Rosa Regional Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Machala Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Machala Airport is used for transporting goods and packages.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
